title: Kyocera 6950 A3 Laser Printer Recommended?
content:
Is there anybody out there using this laser printer and could recommend it?  
I am thinking about to buy one as a general purpose printer here for my home office.  
I’ve searched for reviews here and on the internet, but have nothing found informative so far.  
Thanks.

 [‹ Nodes in MM-fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217084702/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39965 "Go to previous forum topic") [Word randomly using OOT ligatures in OS X 10.5 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217084702/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40064 "Go to next forum topic")
author: derya

comments.content:
My impression is that most people lease their lasers. I don’t have enough experience to give you any advice on the choice though.

I don’t want to hijack your thread, but I’m also interested in this. My office are thinking of leasing a new laser to print brochures, flyers and such.
